start.text: I go where I please, and I please where I go!
Space: the final frontier. These are the voyages of my greatness. My continuing mission: to explore strange new babes; to seek out new foes, and kick their asses.
It's time to kick ass and chew bubble gum...and I'm all outta gum.
It's my way or... hell, it's my way!
Life is like a box of ammo.
I like big guns and I cannot lie.
Looks like Lady Luck just gave you the finger.

start_boss.text: This is it! Let's finish off this bastard once and for all.
End of the line! Last stop total destruction!
Looks like we're about to reach your final destination.
Oh yeah, if it bleeds, I can kill it.
You got alot of guts, lets see what they look like.
You are the missing link; goodbye.
You must be eighteen or older to ride.
Looks like your hardware's gone a little soft.

retreat.text: Get me the hell outta here!

engaged.text: Say hello to my little friend.
There's only two ways this can end; and in both of them you die!
It's down to you and me, you freak!
So, who wants to glow in the dark?
Die, you son of a bitch!
Call me now for your free whipping.
Now you see me, now you're dead.
Looks like it's time for me to go POSTAL!
Nuke 'em 'till they glow, then shoot 'em in the dark!
Did I promise to kill you last? I lied.
My boot, your face; the perfect couple.
I'll rip your head off and shit down your neck!

need_help.text: So much for the rat pack.
What are you waiting for? Christmas?

pursuing.text: I'm not gonna fight you. I'm gonna kick your ass.
I'm an equal opportunity ass kicker.
This'll be a barrel of laughs.
Yo ho ho, and a bottle of Jack!
Looks like you've gotten ahead of yourself there.

running.text: Oh well. Looks like I've broken another heart.
I think I need some down time...
That was close enough to shave my balls.

hull_90.text: Heh, heh, heh, what a mess!

hull_50.text: Damn, those bastards are gonna pay for shooting up my ride.
Take those missiles, and shove 'em up your ass!

hull_30.text: I want a damn refund! This cruise sucks.

overload.text: I'm not dead. I'm coming back for more.

death.text: It's a good day to die.
I always said if there's a way to go, it would have something to do with women, whips and oil.
What kind of shit ending is this?

victory.text: Babes, bullets, bombs! Damn I love this job!
I love the smell of burnt crap in the morning.
There's more where that came from!
Good, bad, I'm the guy with the gun.

victory_boss.text: They keep getting uglier, and I keep getting meaner.
